str2: From an adverb form of hode; in this same spot, i.e. Here or hither.
Probably from the base of ginosko; the intellect, i.e. Mind; by implication, meaning.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Wisdom, insight, skill (human or divine), intelligence. From sophos; wisdom.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From the primary kapto; the head, literally or figuratively.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
A mountain, hill. Probably from an obsolete oro; a mountain: -hill, mount(-ain).
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
Where, whither, in what place. From hos and pou; what(-ever) where, i.e. At whichever spot.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A woman, wife, my lady. Probably from the base of ginomai; a woman; specially, a wife.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To sit, be seated, enthroned; I dwell, reside. From kata; and hemai; to sit down; figuratively, to remain, reside.
